name: Spell Mastery
text: You have mastered a small handful of spells, and can prepare these spells without referencing your spellbooks at all.
benefit: Each time you take this feat, choose a number of spells that you already know equal to your Intelligence modifier. From that point on, you can prepare these spells without referring to a spellbook.
normal: Without this feat, you must use a spellbook to prepare all your spells, except read magic.
mythicText: You’re so familiar with certain spells you can prepare them with the greatest of ease.
mythicBenefit: You can prepare spells you have selected with Spell Mastery as a full-round action. You must spend the appropriate amount of time preparing other spells you have not mastered. As a full-round action, you can expend one use of mythic power to prepare all your spells that you have selected with Spell Mastery.
text_zh: 你对一小部分法术很熟悉，能够完全不靠法术书准备这些法术。
benefit_zh: 每次你获得此专长时，选择数量等同于你的智力修正的已知法术。从那时起，你准备这些法术不需要法术书。
normal_zh: 没有此专长，你必须使用法术书来准备你的所有法术，除了‘阅读魔法’。
mythicText_zh: 你实在太熟悉某些法术了，以至于不需要太多功夫就能准备好。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你能够以整轮动作准备法术掌握专长中所选取的法术。对于其他法术，你就必须花费合适的时间进行准备。以整轮动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，来准备所有在法术掌握专长中已经选取的法术。
